Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class which controls a Sudoku game. The front-end will store this class and can manipulate it via the methods provided. This class can be serialized.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
